issue.title: [Java] Change vector getMinorType to use MinorType instead of Types.MinorType
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1868](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1868). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This is just some renaming to clean things up.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1868?focusedCommentId=16280802) by Bryan Cutler (bryanc):*
Is this still something we want to be in 0.8? `[~siddteotia]` `[~icexelloss]`

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1868?focusedCommentId=16280835) by Li Jin (icexelloss):*
I don't think this has to be in 0.8 - more of a clean up. I am ok with leaving it out.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1868?focusedCommentId=16280890) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Is this an API change?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1868?focusedCommentId=16280892) by Li Jin (icexelloss):*
It's not an API change.
